Package dataframe.composite

Interface IComponent

All Known Subinterfaces:
IDataFrame
All Known Implementing Classes:
CSV, Directory, JSON, TXT
public interface IComponent
Component interface used to implement a Composite pattern. Interface used by dataframe.composite.Directory and dataframe.IDataFrame. Directories can have dataframes or subdirectories inside.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void accept​(IVisitor visitor)
    Method needed to implement a visitor pattern
    TableElement at​(int id, java.lang.String label)
    Returns the value of a single item by row and columName from a Composite
    int columns()
    Number of columns (number of labels)
    Table getTable()
    Creates a single Table with the same labels and data as this composite The labels of each child need to be identical and have the same order, else it returns null
    TableElement iat​(int row, int col)
    Returns the value of a single item by row and column index from a Composite
    Table query​(java.lang.String label, java.util.function.Predicate<TableElement> p)
    Filters the table elements by specific criteria.
    int size()
    Number of elements (number of rows without counting the labels)
    Table sort​(java.lang.String label, java.util.Comparator<TableElement> comparator)
    Sorts the composite by one column and specific criteria, returns a single ordered table.

  • Method Details

    • at

      TableElement at​(int id, java.lang.String label)
      Returns the value of a single item by row and columName from a Composite
      Parameters:
      id - row (from 0 to the sum of all component sizes -1)
      label - columnName
      Returns:
      TableElement on that position, if not found returns null

    • iat

      TableElement iat​(int row, int col)
      Returns the value of a single item by row and column index from a Composite
      Parameters:
      row - row index (from 0 to the sum of all component sizes -1)
      col - column index(from 0 to columns()-1)
      Returns:
      TableElement on that position, if not found returns null

    • columns

      int columns()
      Number of columns (number of labels)
      Returns:
      number of columns

    • size

      int size()
      Number of elements (number of rows without counting the labels)
      Returns:
      number of elements

    • sort

      Table sort​(java.lang.String label, java.util.Comparator<TableElement> comparator)
      Sorts the composite by one column and specific criteria, returns a single ordered table. TableElementComparator inside the package table.element can be used as comp parameter. Label names of each component need to be equal and ordered.
      Parameters:
      label - column name
      comparator - Comparator that implements a TableElement Comparator
      Returns:
      Sorted table

    • query

      Table query​(java.lang.String label, java.util.function.Predicate<TableElement> p)
      Filters the table elements by specific criteria. Predicates can be found inside table.element.TableElement class
      Parameters:
      label - column name
      p - predicate that will be used to filter the table
      Returns:
      New filtered table

    • getTable

      Table getTable()
      Creates a single Table with the same labels and data as this composite The labels of each child need to be identical and have the same order, else it returns null
      Returns:
      Table with the same labels and data as this composite

    • accept

      void accept​(IVisitor visitor)
      Method needed to implement a visitor pattern
      Parameters:
      visitor - IVisitor element
